create_train_parts.ponder.train_assembly: Sometimes the Train is too far away from the Station to enter the Train
Use Train Steps or Train Slides for easier access
The Steps and Slides open automatically when it arrives at the station
And close when the Train leaves the Station
create_train_parts.ponder.train_steps.te: The Train Step normally opens with a 'Slide'
But this is a problem if there is a Block in front
To solve this, configure the Step to not extend the Slide
Hold control to modify all connected Train Steps
create_train_parts.ponder.window_modes.t: But you can configure it to open another Direction
Connected Windows with the same Mode will open together
create_train_parts.ponder.train_behaviou: Windows that are set to open Left or Right open automatically at Train Stations
Windows that are set to open Up or Down can only be opened manually
create_train_parts.ponder.crossing.text_: Crossing Gates need kinetic power to operate
Reverse the power to change direction
If you want to extend the Crossing Gate, simply place down Arm Extenders
create_train_parts.ponder.railway_crossi: When using Crossing Gates with Signals, you can create a safe Railway Crossing
